title: Compilation: anyway what is an Australian?
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Emigration and immigration
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Race discrimination
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Vietnamese - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Italians - Australia
abstract: Anyway..what is an Australian? (23 min. 1980)--Arrivederci Roma (24 min. 1979)--Minh: a Vietnamese (10 min. 1979).
description: Anyway...what is an Australian? (Melb., dir. Barbara Boyd): Views the concept of multiculturalism through the eyes of several new Australians in Melbourne. "Arrivederci Roma" (Melb., prod. Richard Zatorski ; dir. Geoffrey Wright): A new Australian student comes to grips with his first swimming lesson. "Minh: a Vietnamese" (Sydney): A look at the life of a Vietnamese refugee in Australia.
